footer.description: AI-powered comprehensive coaching platform providing personalized coaching services across multiple domains.

hero.title: Transform Your Potential with
hero.subtitle: Experience the future of personal and professional development with 7M Business's comprehensive AI-driven coaching platform across all life domains.

services.title: Comprehensive Coaching Services
services.subtitle: Discover our full range of AI-powered coaching services designed to support individuals, teams, businesses, and organizations across all domains.

individualCoaching.title: Individual Coaching
individualCoaching.description: Personalized one-on-one coaching sessions tailored to your unique goals and development needs.

teamCoaching.title: Team Coaching
teamCoaching.description: Optimize team dynamics and leadership skills with comprehensive group coaching programs.

businessCoaching.title: Business Coaching
businessCoaching.description: Strategic business guidance to optimize performance and drive organizational growth.

economicCoaching.title: Economic Coaching
economicCoaching.description: Navigate economic trends and make informed financial decisions with expert guidance.

studentsCoaching.title: Student's Coaching
studentsCoaching.description: Specialized coaching to help students build careers and land their dream jobs with expert guidance.

services.notSure: Not sure which service is right for you?
services.aiRecommendation: Our AI-powered recommendation system can help you find the perfect coaching solution based on your unique goals and needs.

features.title: Powered by Advanced AI Technology
features.subtitle: Experience the future of coaching with our cutting-edge AI platform that delivers personalized insights, real-time feedback, and comprehensive analytics.

aiCoach.title: AI Coach
aiCoach.description: Intelligent coaching recommendations powered by advanced AI algorithms that adapt to your learning style and goals.

dashboard.title: Interactive Dashboard
dashboard.description: Real-time data visualization and progress tracking with comprehensive analytics and insights.

reports.title: Smart Reports
reports.description: Comprehensive reporting system with detailed analytics, trend identification, and predictive modeling.

monitoring.title: Real-time Monitoring
monitoring.description: Continuous assessment and feedback systems that track your progress and provide instant guidance.

features.ctaTitle: Ready to Experience the Future of Coaching?
features.ctaSubtitle: Join thousands of users who have transformed their personal and professional lives with our AI-powered coaching platform.

about.title: About 7M Business
about.subtitle: We're pioneering the future of coaching by combining human expertise with artificial intelligence to create transformative learning experiences.
about.missionText: To democratize access to high-quality coaching by leveraging AI technology to provide personalized, affordable, and accessible coaching solutions that help individuals, teams, and organizations achieve their full potential across all domains of life.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: We leverage cutting-edge AI technology to deliver personalized coaching experiences.

excellence.title: Excellence
excellence.description: Our platform maintains the highest standards of coaching quality and user experience.

accessibility.title: Accessibility
accessibility.description: We make professional coaching accessible to everyone, regardless of location or schedule.

results.title: Results
results.description: Our data-driven approach ensures measurable progress and tangible outcomes.

team.title: Meet Our Leadership Team
team.subtitle: Our diverse team of AI experts, certified coaches, and researchers work together to create the most advanced coaching platform available.

contact.title: Ready to Transform Your Life?
contact.subtitle: Join thousands of individuals and organizations who have already started their journey to success with 7M Business. Get started today and unlock your potential.

email.title: Email

newsletter.title: Stay Updated
newsletter.subtitle: Subscribe to our newsletter for the latest coaching insights and platform updates.

dashboard.title: Your AI-Powered Dashboard
dashboard.subtitle: Track your progress, analyze your performance, and get intelligent insights to accelerate your personal and professional growth.
dashboard.ctaSubtitle: Schedule your next coaching session and continue your journey to success with personalized guidance from our expert coaches.
